original: gorakṣa-śatakam
analyzed: gorakṣaśatakam

original: oṃ haṭha-yoga-gorakṣa-śataka-prārambhaḥ
analyzed: om haṭhayoga gorakṣaśataka prārambhaḥ

original: śrī-guruṃ paramānandaṃ vande svānanda-vigraham /
yasya saṃnidhya-mātreṇa cidānandāyate tanuḥ // GorS(2)_1 //
analyzed: yasya saṃnidhya mātreṇa cidānandāyate tanuḥ

original: antar-niścalitātma-dīpa-kalikā-svādhāra-bandhādibhiḥ yo yogī yuga-kalpa-kāla-kalanāt tvaṃ jajegīyate /
analyzed: antar niścalita ātma dīpa kalikā sva ādhāra bandha ādibhiḥ yaḥ yogī yuga kalpa kāla kalanāt tvam

original: jñānāmoda-mahodadhiḥ samabhavad yatrādināthaḥ svayaṃ vyaktāvyakta-guṇādhikaṃ tam aniśaṃ śrī-mīnanāthaṃ bhaje // GorS(2)_2 //
analyzed: jñāna āmoda mahā udadhiḥ samabhavat yatra ādināthaḥ svayam vyakta avyakta guṇa adhikam tam aniśam śrī mīnanātham bhaje

original: namaskṛtya guruṃ bhaktyā gorakṣo jñānam uttamam /
analyzed: namaskṛtya gurum bhaktyā gorakṣaḥ jñānam uttamam

original: abhīṣṭaṃ yogināṃ brūte paramānanda-kārakam // GorS(2)_3 //
analyzed: abhīṣṭam yoginām brūte parama ānanda kārakam

original: gorakṣaḥ śatakaṃ vakti yogināṃ hita-kāmyayā /
analyzed: gorakṣaḥ śatakam vakti yoginām hita kāmyayā

original: dhruvaṃ yasyāvabodhena jāyate paramaṃ padam // GorS(2)_4 //
analyzed: dhruvam yasya avabodhena jāyate paramam padam

original: etad vimukti-sopānam etat kālasya vañcanam /
analyzed: etat vimukti sopānam etat kālasya vañcanam

original: yad vyāvṛttaṃ mano mohād āsaktaṃ paramātmani // GorS(2)_5 (=1/2) //
analyzed: yat vyāvṛttam manaḥ mohāt āsaktam paramātmani

original: dvija-sevita-śākhasya śruti-kalpa-taroḥ phalam /
analyzed: dvija sevita śākhasya śruti kalpataroḥ phalam

original: śamanaṃ bhava-tāpasya yogaṃ bhajati sajjanaḥ // GorS(2)_6 (=1/3) //
analyzed: śamanam bhava tāpasya yogam bhajati sat janaḥ

original: āsanaṃ prāṇa-saṃyāmaḥ pratyāhāro'tha dhāraṇā /
analyzed: āsanam prāṇasaṃyāmaḥ pratyāhāraḥ utha dhāraṇā

original: dhyānaṃ samādhir etāni yogāṅgāni bhavanti ṣaṭ // GorS(2)_7 (=1/4) //
analyzed: dhyānam samādhiḥ etāni yoga aṅgāni bhavanti ṣaḍ

original: āsanāni tu tāvanti yāvatyo jīva-jātayaḥ /
analyzed: āsanāni tu tāvanti yāvatyaḥ jīva jātayaḥ

original: eteṣām akhilān bhedān vijānāti maheśvaraḥ // GorS(2)_8 (=1/5) //
analyzed: eteṣām akhilān bhedān vijānāti maheśvaraḥ

original: caturāśīti-lakṣāṇāṃ ekam ekam udāhṛtam /
analyzed: catura aśīti lakṣāṇām ekam ekam udāhṛtam

original: tataḥ śivena pīṭhānāṃ ṣoḍeśānaṃ śataṃ kṛtam // GorS(2)_9 (=1/6) //
analyzed: tatas śivena pīṭhānām ṣoḍeśānam śatam kṛtam

original: āsanebhyaḥ samastebhyo dvayam eva viśiṣyate /
analyzed: āsanebhyaḥ samastebhyaḥ dvayam eva viśiṣyate

original: ekaṃ siddhāsanaṃ proktaṃ dvitīyaṃ kamalāsanam // GorS(2)_10 (=1/7) //
analyzed: ekam siddhāsanam proktam dvitīyam kamalāsanam

original: yoni-sthānakam aṅghri-mūla-ghaṭitaṃ kṛtvā dṛḍhaṃ vinyasen meḍhre pādam athaikam eva niyataṃ kṛtvā samaṃ vigraham /
analyzed: yoni sthānakam aṅghri mūla ghaṭitam kṛtvā dṛḍham vinyaset meḍhre pādam athā ekam eva niyatam kṛtvā samam vigraham

original: sthāṇuḥ saṃyamitendriyo'cala-dṛśā paśyan bhruvor antaram etan mokṣa-kavāṭa-bheda-janakaṃ siddhāsanaṃ procyate // GorS(2)_11 (=1/8) //
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ saṃyamita indriya ucala dṛśā paśyan bhruvoḥ antaram etat mokṣa kavāṭa bheda janakam siddhāsanam procyate  /

original: vāmorūpari dakṣiṇaṃ hi caraṇaṃ saṃsthāpya vāmaṃ tathā dakṣorūpari paścimena vidhinā dhṛtvā karābhyāṃ dṛḍham /
analyzed: vāma ūru upari dakṣiṇam hi caraṇam saṃsthāpya vāmam tathā dakṣa ūru upari paścimena vidhinā dhṛtvā karābhyām dṛḍham

original: aṅguṣṭhau hṛdaye nidhāya cibukaṃ nāsāgram ālokayed etad-vyādhi-vikāra-hāri yamināṃ padmāsanaṃ procyate // GorS(2)_12 (=1/9) //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhau hṛdaye nidhāya cibukam nāsā agram ālokayet etat vyādhi vikāra hāri yaminām padmāsanam procyate  /

original: ṣaṭ-cakraṃ ṣoḍaśādhāraṃ trilakṣaṃ vyoma-pañcakam /
sva-dehe ye na jānanti kathaṃ sidhyanti yoginaḥ // GorS(2)_13 //
analyzed: sva dehe ye na jānanti katham sidhyanti yoginaḥ

original: eka-stambhaṃ nava-dvāraṃ gṛhaṃ pañcādhidaivatam /
analyzed: eka stambham nava dvāram gṛham pañca adhidaivatam

original: sva-dehaṃ ye na jānanti kathaṃ sidhyanti yoginaḥ // GorS(2)_14 //
analyzed: sva deham ye na jānanti katham sidhyanti yoginaḥ

original: caturdalaṃ syād ādhāraḥ svādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ṣaṭ-dalam /
analyzed: catur dalam syāt ādhāraḥ svādhiṣṭhānam ca ṣaṣ dalam

original: nābhau daśa-dalaṃ padmaṃ sūrya-saṅkhya-dalaṃ hṛdi // GorS(2)_15 //
analyzed: nābhau daśa dalam padmam sūrya saṅkhya dalam hṛdi

original: kaṇṭhe syāt ṣoḍaśa-dalaṃ bhrū-madhye dvidalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: kaṇṭhe syāt ṣoḍaśa dalam bhrū madhye dvi dalam tathā

original: sahasra-dalam ākhyātaṃ brahma-randhre mahā-pathe // GorS(2)_16 //
analyzed: sahasra dalam ākhyātam brahmarandhre mahāpathe

original: ādhāraḥ prathamaṃ cakraṃ svādhiṣṭhānaṃ dvitīyakam /
analyzed: ādhāraḥ prathamam cakram svādhiṣṭhānam dvitīyakam

original: yoni-sthānaṃ dvayor madhye kāma-rūpaṃ nigadyate // GorS(2)_17 (=1/10) //
ādhārākhyaṃ guda-sthānaṃ paṅkajaṃ ca catur-dalam /
analyzed: ādhāra ākhyam guda sthānam paṅkajam ca catur dalam

original: tan-madhye procyate yoniḥ kāmākṣā siddha-vanditā // GorS(2)_18 (=1/11) //
analyzed: tad madhye procyate yoniḥ kāmākṣā siddha vanditā

original: yoni-madhye mahā-liṅgaṃ paścimābhimukhaṃ sthitam /
analyzed: yoni madhye mahā liṅgam paścima abhimukham sthitam

original: mastake maṇivad bimbaṃ yo jānāti sa yogavit // GorS(2)_19 (=1/12) //
analyzed: mastake maṇi vat bimbam yaḥ jānāti sa yoga vid

original: tapta-cāmīkarābhāsaṃ taḍil-lekheva visphurat /
analyzed: tapta cāmīkara ābhāsam taḍit lekhā iva visphurat

original: trikoṇaṃ tat-puraṃ vahner adho-meḍhrāt pratiṣṭhitam // GorS(2)_20 (=1/13) //
analyzed: trikoṇam tat puram vahneḥ adhas meḍhrāt pratiṣṭhitam

original: yat samādhau paraṃ jyotir anantaṃ viśvato-mukham /
analyzed: yat samādhau param jyotiḥ anantam viśvatomukham

original: tasmin dṛṣṭe mahā-yoge yātāyātaṃ na vidyate // GorS(2)_21 //
analyzed: tasmin dṛṣṭe mahā yoge yāta āyātam na vidyate

original: sva-śabdena bhavet prāṇaḥ svādhiṣṭhānaṃ tad-āśrayaḥ /
analyzed: sva śabdena bhavet prāṇaḥ svādhiṣṭhānam tad āśrayaḥ

original: svādhiṣṭhānāt padād asmān meḍhram evābhidhīyate // GorS(2)_22 (=1/14) //
analyzed: svādhiṣṭhānāt padāt asmāt meḍhram eva abhidhīyate

original: tantunā maṇivat proto yatra kandaḥ suṣumṇayā /
analyzed: tantunā maṇi vat protaḥ yatra kandaḥ suṣumṇayā

original: tan-nābhi-maṇḍalaṃ cakraṃ procyate maṇi-pūrakam // GorS(2)_23 (=1/15) //
analyzed: tad nābhi maṇḍalam cakram procyate maṇipūrakam

original: dvādaśāre mahā-cakre puṇya-pāpa-vivarjite /
analyzed: dvādaśa are mahācakre puṇya pāpa vivarjite

original: tāvaj jīvo bhramaty eva yāvat tattvaṃ na vindati // GorS(2)_24 //
analyzed: tāvat jīvaḥ bhramati eva yāvat tattvam na vindati

original: ūrdhvaṃ meḍhrād adho nābheḥ kanda-yoniḥ khagāṇḍavat /
analyzed: ūrdhvam meḍhrāt adhas nābheḥ kandayoniḥ khaga aṇḍa vat

original: tatra nāḍyaḥ samutpannāḥ sahasrāṇāṃ dvisaptatiḥ // GorS(2)_25 (=1/16) //
analyzed: tatra nāḍyaḥ samutpannāḥ sahasrāṇām dvisaptatiḥ

original: teṣu nāḍi-sahasreṣu dvisaptatir udāhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: teṣu nāḍi sahasreṣu dvisaptatiḥ udāhṛtāḥ

original: pradhānaṃ prāṇa-vāhinyo bhūyas tatra daśa smṛtāḥ // GorS(2)_26 (=1/17) //
analyzed: pradhānam prāṇa vāhinyaḥ bhūyas tatra daśa smṛtāḥ

original: iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā /
analyzed: iḍā ca piṅgalā ca eva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā

original: gāndhārī hasti-jihvā ca pūṣā caiva yaśasvinī // GorS(2)_27 (=1/18) //
analyzed: gāndhārī hastijihvā ca pūṣā ca eva yaśasvinī

original: alambuṣā kuhūś caiva śaṅkhinī daśamī smṛtā /
analyzed: alambuṣā kuhūḥ ca eva śaṅkhinī daśamī smṛtā

original: etan nāḍi-mayaṃ cakraṃ jñātavyaṃ yogibhiḥ sadā // GorS(2)_28 (=1/19) //
analyzed: etat nāḍi mayam cakram jñātavyam yogibhiḥ sadā

original: iḍā vāme sthitā bhāge piṅgalā dakṣiṇe tathā /
analyzed: iḍā vāme sthitā bhāge piṅgalā dakṣiṇe tathā

original: suṣumṇā madhya-deśe tu gāndhārī vāma-cakṣuṣi // GorS(2)_29 (=1/20) //
analyzed: suṣumṇā madhya deśe tu gāndhārī vāma cakṣuṣi

original: dakṣiṇe hasti-jihvā ca pūṣā karṇe ca dakṣiṇe /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe hasti jihvā ca pūṣā karṇe ca dakṣiṇe

original: yaśasvinī vāma-karṇe cāsane vāpy alambuṣā // GorS(2)_30 (=1/21) //
analyzed: yaśasvinī vāma karṇe ca āsane vā api alambuṣā

original: kuhūś ca liṅga-deśe tu mūla-sthāne ca śaṅkhinī /
analyzed: kuhūḥ ca liṅga deśe tu mūlasthāne ca śaṅkhinī

original: evaṃ dvāram upāśritya tiṣṭhanti daśa-nāḍikāḥ // GorS(2)_31 (=1/22) //
analyzed: evam dvāram upāśritya tiṣṭhanti daśa nāḍikāḥ

original: iḍā-piṅgalā-suṣumṇā ca tisro nāḍya udāhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: iḍā piṅgalā suṣumṇā ca tisraḥ nāḍyaḥ udāhṛtāḥ

original: satataṃ prāṇa-vāhinyaḥ soma-sūryāgni-devatāḥ // GorS(2)_32 (=1/23) //
analyzed: satatam prāṇa vāhinyaḥ soma sūrya agni devatāḥ

original: prāṇo'pānaḥ samānaś ca udāno vyānau ca vāyavaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa upānaḥ samānaḥ ca udānaḥ vyānau ca vāyavaḥ

original: nāgaḥ kūrmo'tha kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ // GorS(2)_33 (=1/24) //
analyzed: nāgaḥ kūrmaḥ utha kṛkaraḥ devadattaḥ dhanañjayaḥ

original: hṛdi prāṇo vasen nityaṃ apāno guda-maṇḍale /
analyzed: hṛdi prāṇaḥ vaset nityam apānaḥ guda maṇḍale

original: samāno nābhi-deśe syād udānaḥ kaṇṭha-madhyagaḥ // GorS(2)_34 //
analyzed: samānaḥ nābhi deśe syāt udānaḥ kaṇṭha madhya gaḥ

original: udgāre nāgākhyātaḥ kūrma unmīlane smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: udgāre nāga ākhyātaḥ kūrmaḥ unmīlane smṛtaḥ

original: kṛkaraḥ kṣuta-kṛj jñeyo devadatto vijṛmbhaṇe // GorS(2)_35 //
na jahāti mṛtaṃ cāpi sarva-vyāpi dhanañjayaḥ /
analyzed: na jahāti mṛtam ca api sarva vyāpi dhanañjayaḥ

original: ete sarvāsu nāḍīṣu bhramante jīva-rūpiṇaḥ // GorS(2)_36 (=1/25) //
analyzed: ete sarvāsu nāḍīṣu bhramante jīva rūpiṇaḥ

original: ākṣipto bhuja-daṇḍena yathoccalati kandukaḥ /
analyzed: ākṣiptaḥ bhuja daṇḍena yathā uccalati kandukaḥ

original: prāṇāpāna-samākṣiptas tathā jīvo na tiṣṭhati // GorS(2)_38 (=1/27) //
analyzed: prāṇa apāna samākṣiptaḥ tathā jīvaḥ na tiṣṭhati

original: prāṇāpāna-vaśo jīvo hy adhaś cordhvaṃ ca dhāvati /
analyzed: prāṇa apāna vaśaḥ jīvaḥ hi adhas ca ūrdhvam ca dhāvati

original: vāma-dakṣiṇa-mārgeṇa cañcalatvān na dṛśyate // GorS(2)_39 (=1/26) //
analyzed: vāma dakṣiṇa mārgeṇa cañcala tvāt na dṛśyate  /

original: rajju-baddho yathā śyeno gato'py ākṛṣyate(?) /
analyzed: rajju baddhaḥ yathā śyenaḥ gataḥ upi ākṛṣyate

original: guṇa-baddhas tathā jīvaḥ prāṇāpānena kṛṣyate // GorS(2)_40 (=1/28) //
analyzed: guṇa baddhaḥ tathā jīvaḥ prāṇa apānena kṛṣyate

original: apānaḥ karṣati prāṇaḥ prāṇo'pānaṃ ca karṣati /
analyzed: apānaḥ karṣati prāṇaḥ prāṇa upānam ca karṣati

original: ūrdhvādhaḥ saṃsthitāv etau saṃyojayati yogavit // GorS(2)_41 (=1/29) //
analyzed: ūrdhva adhas saṃsthitau etau saṃyojayati yoga vid

original: ha-kāreṇa bahir yāti sa-kāreṇa viśet punaḥ /
analyzed: hakāreṇa bahis yāti sakāreṇa viśet punar

original: haṃsa-haṃsety amuṃ mantraṃ jīvo japati sarvadā // GorS(2)_42 //
analyzed: haṃsa haṃsa iti amum mantram jīvaḥ japati sarvadā

original: ṣaṭ-śatānitvaho-rātre sahasrāṇy eka-viṃśatiḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣ śatā anitu ahorātre sahasrāṇi ekaviṃśatiḥ

original: etat saṅkhyānvitaṃ mantra jīvo japati sarvadā // GorS(2)_43 //
analyzed: etat saṅkhyā anvitam mantra jīvaḥ japati sarvadā

original: ajapā nāma gāyatrī yogināṃ mokṣa-dāyinī /
analyzed: ajapā nāma gāyatrī yoginām mokṣa dāyinī

original: asyāḥ saṅkalpa-mātreṇa sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GorS(2)_44 //
analyzed: asyāḥ saṅkalpa mātreṇa sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: anayā sadṛśī vidyā anayā sadṛśo japaḥ /
analyzed: anayā sadṛśī vidyā anayā sadṛśaḥ japaḥ

original: anayā sadṛśaṃ jñānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // GorS(2)_45 //
analyzed: anayā sadṛśam jñānam na bhūtam na bhaviṣyati

original: kundalinyāḥ samudbhūtā gāyatrī prāṇa-dhāriṇī /
analyzed: kundalinyāḥ samudbhūtā gāyatrī prāṇa dhāriṇī

original: prāṇa-vidyā mahā-vidyā yas tāṃ vetti sa yogavit // GorS(2)_46 //
analyzed: prāṇa vidyā mahā vidyā yaḥ tām vetti sa yoga vid

original: kandordhvaṃ kuṇḍalī śaktir aṣṭadhā kuṇḍalākṛti /
analyzed: kanda ūrdhvam kuṇḍalī śaktiḥ aṣṭadhā kuṇḍala ākṛti

original: brahma-dvāra-mukhaṃ nityaṃ mukhenācchādya tiṣṭhati // GorS(2)_47 (=1/30) //
analyzed: brahmadvāra mukham nityam mukhena ācchādya tiṣṭhati

original: yena dvāreṇa gantavyaṃ brahma-sthānam anāmayam /
analyzed: yena dvāreṇa gantavyam brahmasthānam anāmayam

original: mukhenācchādya tad-dvāraṃ prasuptā parameśvarī // GorS(2)_48 //
analyzed: mukhena ācchādya tat dvāram prasuptā parameśvarī

original: prabuddhā vahni-yogena manasā mārutā hatā /
analyzed: prabuddhā vahni yogena manasā mārutā hatā

original: sūcīvad guṇam ādāya vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ suṣumṇayā // GorS(2)_49 (=1/31) //
analyzed: sūcī vat guṇam ādāya vrajati ūrdhvam suṣumṇayā

original: prasphurad-bhujagākārā padma-tantu-nibhā śubhā /
analyzed: prasphurat bhujaga ākārā padma tantu nibhā śubhā

original: prabuddhā vahni-yogena vratya ūrdhvaṃ suṣumṇayā // GorS(2)_50 //
analyzed: prabuddhāḥ vahni yogena ūrdhvam suṣumṇayā

original: udghaṭayet kapātaṃ tu yathā kuñcikayā haṭhāt /
analyzed: udghaṭayet kapātam tu yathā kuñcikayā haṭhāt

original: kuṇḍalinyā tathā yogī mokṣa-dvāraṃ prabhedayet // GorS(2)_51 //
analyzed: kuṇḍalinyā tathā yogī mokṣa dvāram prabhedayet

original: kṛtvā sampuṭitau karau dṛḍhataraṃ baddhvā tu padmāsanaṃ gāḍhaṃ vakṣasi sannidhāya cibukaṃ dhyātvā ca tat prekṣitam /
analyzed: kṛtvā sampuṭitau karau dṛḍhataram baddhvā tu padmāsanam gāḍham vakṣasi sannidhāya cibukam dhyātvā ca tat prekṣitam

original: vāraṃ vāram apānam ūrdhvam anilaṃ proccārayet pūritaṃ muñcan prāṇam upaiti bodham atulaṃ śakti-prabodhān naraḥ // GorS(2)_52 (=HYP 1.50) //
analyzed: vāram vāram apānam ūrdhvam anilam proccārayet pūritam muñcan prāṇam upaiti bodham atulam śakti prabodhāt naraḥ

original: aṅgānāṃ mardanaṃ kuryāc chrama-jātena vāriṇā /
analyzed: aṅgānām mardanam kuryāt śrama jātena vāriṇā

original: kaṭv-amla-lavaṇa-tyāgī kṣīra-bhojanam ācaret // GorS(2)_53 (=1/50) //
analyzed: kaṭu amla lavaṇa tyāgī kṣīra bhojanam ācaret

original: brahmacārī mitāhārī tyāgī yoga-parāyaṇaḥ /
abdād ūrdhvaṃ bhavet siddho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GorS(2)_54 (=HYP 1.59) //
analyzed: abdāt ūrdhvam bhavet siddhaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: susnigdhaṃ madhurāhāraṃ caturthāṃśa-vivarjitam /
analyzed: su snigdham madhura āhāram caturtha aṃśa vivarjitam

original: bhujyate sura-samprītyai mitāhāraḥ sa ucyate // GorS(2)_55 (=HYP 1.60) //
analyzed: bhujyate sura samprītyai mita āhāraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: kandordhvaṃ kuṇḍalī śaktir aṣṭadhā kuṇḍalākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: kanda ūrdhvam kuṇḍalī śaktiḥ aṣṭadhā kuṇḍala ākṛtiḥ

original: bandhanāya ca mūḍhānāṃ yogināṃ mokṣadā smṛtā // GorS(2)_56 (=HYP 3.107) //
analyzed: bandhanāya ca mūḍhānām yoginām mokṣa dā smṛtā

original: mahāmudrāṃ namo-mudrām uḍḍiyānaṃ jalandharam /
analyzed: mahāmudrām namaḥ mudrām uḍḍiyānam jalandharam

original: mūla-bandhaṃ ca yo vetti sa yogī siddhi-bhājanam // GorS(2)_57 (=1/32) //
analyzed: mūlabandham ca yaḥ vetti sa yogī siddhi bhājanam

original: śodhanaṃ nāḍi-jālasya cālanaṃ candra-sūryayoḥ /
analyzed: śodhanam nāḍi jālasya cālanam candra sūryayoḥ

original: rasānāṃ śoṣaṇaṃ caiva mahā-mudrābhidhīyate // GorS(2)_58 //
analyzed: rasānām śoṣaṇam ca eva mahāmudrā abhidhīyate

original: vakṣo-nyasta-hanur nipīḍya suciraṃ yoniṃ ca vāmāṅghriṇā hastābhyām avadhāritaṃ prasaritaṃ pādaṃ tathā dakṣiṇam /
analyzed: vakṣaḥ nyasta hanuḥ nipīḍya su ciram yonim ca vāma aṅghriṇā hastābhyām avadhāritam prasaritam pādam tathā dakṣiṇam

original: āpūrya śvasanena kukṣi-yugalaṃ baddhvā śanai recayed eṣā pātaka-nāśinī sumahatī mudrā nṝṇāṃ procyate // GorS(2)_59 (=1/33) //
analyzed: āpūrya śvasanena kukṣi yugalam baddhvā śanais recayet eṣā pātaka nāśinī su mahatī mudrā nṝṇām procyate  /

original: candrāṅgena samabhyasya sūryāṅgenābhyaset punaḥ /
analyzed: candra aṅgena samabhyasya sūrya aṅgena abhyaset punar

original: yāvat tulyā bhavet saṅkhyā tato mudrāṃ visarjayet // GorS(2)_60 (=HYP 3.15) //
analyzed: yāvat tulyā bhavet saṅkhyā tatas mudrām visarjayet

original: na hi pathyam apathyaṃ vā rasāḥ sarve'pi nīrasāḥ /
analyzed: na hi pathyam apathyam vā rasāḥ sarve api nīrasāḥ

original: api muktaṃ viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pīyūṣam api jīryate // GorS(2)_61 (=HYP 3.16) //
analyzed: api muktam viṣam ghoram pīyūṣam api jīryate

original: kṣaya-kuṣṭha-gudāvarta- gulmājīrṇa-purogamāḥ /
analyzed: kṣaya kuṣṭha gudāvarta gulma ajīrṇa purogamāḥ

original: tasya doṣāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti mahāmudrāṃ tu yo'bhyaset // GorS(2)_62 (=HYP 3.17) //
analyzed: tasya doṣāḥ kṣayam yānti mahāmudrām tu

original: kathiteyaṃ mahāmudrā mahā-siddhi-karā nṝṇām /
analyzed: kathitā iyam mahāmudrā mahā siddhi karā nṝṇām

original: gopanīyā prayatnena na deyā yasya kasyacit // GorS(2)_63 (=HYP 3.18) //
analyzed: gopanīyā prayatnena na deyā yasya kasyacid

original: kapāla-kuhare jihvā praviṣṭā viparītagā /
analyzed: kapāla kuhare jihvā praviṣṭā viparīta gā

original: bhruvor antargatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati khecarī // GorS(2)_64 (=1/34) //
analyzed: bhruvoḥ antargatā dṛṣṭiḥ mudrā bhavati khecarī

original: na rogo maraṇaṃ tandrā na nidrā na kṣudhā tṛṣā /
analyzed: na rogaḥ maraṇam tandrā na nidrā na kṣudhā tṛṣā

original: na ca mūrcchā bhavet tasya yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarīm // GorS(2)_65 (=HYP 3.39) //
analyzed: na ca mūrcchā bhavet tasya yaḥ mudrām vetti khecarīm

original: pīḍyate na sa rogeṇa lipyate na ca karmaṇā /
analyzed: pīḍyate na sa rogeṇa lipyate na ca karmaṇā

original: bādhyate na sa kālena yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarīm // GorS(2)_66 (=HYP 3.40) //
analyzed: bādhyate na sa kālena yaḥ mudrām vetti khecarīm

original: cittaṃ carati khe yasmāj jihvā carati khe gatā /
analyzed: cittam carati khe yasmāt jihvā carati khe gatā

original: tenaiṣā khecarī nāma mudrā siddhair nirūpitā // GorS(2)_67 (=HYP 3.41) //
analyzed: tena eṣā khecarī nāma mudrā siddhaiḥ nirūpitā

original: bindu-mūlaṃ śarīraṃ tu śirās tatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
analyzed: bindu mūlam śarīram tu śirāḥ tatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: bhāvayanti śarīraṃ yā āpāda-tala-mastakam // GorS(2)_68 //
analyzed: bhāvayanti śarīram yāḥ āpādatalamastakam

original: khecaryā mudritaṃ yena vivaraṃ lambikordhvataḥ /
analyzed: khecaryā mudritam yena vivaram lambikā ūrdhvatas

original: na tasya kṣarate binduḥ kāminyāliṅgitasya ca // GorS(2)_69 //
analyzed: na tasya kṣarate binduḥ kāminī āliṅgitasya ca

original: yāvad binduḥ sthito dehe tāvat kāla-bhayaṃ kutaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat binduḥ sthitaḥ dehe tāvat kāla bhayam kutas

original: yāvad baddhā nabho-mudrā tāvad bindur na gacchati // GorS(2)_70 //
analyzed: yāvat baddhā nabhomudrā tāvat binduḥ na gacchati

original: calito'pi yadā binduḥ samprāptaś ca hutāśanam /
analyzed: calitaḥ api yadā binduḥ samprāptaḥ ca hutāśanam

original: vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ hṛtaḥ śaktyā niruddho yoni-mudrayā // GorS(2)_71 (=HYP 3.43) //
analyzed: vrajati ūrdhvam hṛtaḥ śaktyā niruddhaḥ yonimudrayā

original: sa punar dvividho binduḥ paṇḍuro lohitas tathā /
analyzed: sa punar dvividhaḥ binduḥ paṇḍuraḥ lohitaḥ tathā

original: pāṇḍuraṃ śukram ity āhur lohitaṃ tu mahārājaḥ // GorS(2)_72 //
analyzed: pāṇḍuram śukram iti āhuḥ lohitam tu mahā rājaḥ

original: sindūra-drava-saṅkāśaṃ ravi-sthāne sthitaṃ rajaḥ /
analyzed: sindūra drava saṅkāśam ravi sthāne sthitam rajaḥ

original: śaśi-sthāne sthito bindus tayor aikyaṃ sudurlabham // GorS(2)_73 //
analyzed: śaśi sthāne sthitaḥ binduḥ tayoḥ aikyam su durlabham

original: binduḥ śivo rajaḥ śaktir bindum indū rajo raviḥ /
analyzed: binduḥ śivaḥ rajaḥ śaktiḥ bindum induḥ rajaḥ raviḥ

original: ubhayoḥ saṅgamād eva prāpyate paramaṃ padam // GorS(2)_74 //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ saṅgamāt eva prāpyate paramam padam

original: vāyunā śakti-cāreṇa preritaṃ tu mahā-rajaḥ /
analyzed: vāyunā śakti cāreṇa preritam tu mahārajaḥ

original: bindunaiti sahaikatvaṃ bhaved divyaṃ vapus tadā // GorS(2)_75 //
analyzed: bindunā eti saha eka tvam bhavet divyam vapuḥ tadā

original: śukraṃ candreṇa saṃyuktaṃ rajaḥ sūryeṇa saṃyutam /
analyzed: śukram candreṇa saṃyuktam rajaḥ sūryeṇa saṃyutam

original: tayoḥ samarasaikatvaṃ yojānāti sa yogavit // GorS(2)_76 //
analyzed: tayoḥ samarasa eka tvam yaḥ jānāti sa yoga vid

original: uḍḍīnaṃ kurute yasmād aviśrāntaṃ mahā-khagaḥ /
analyzed: uḍḍīnam kurute yasmāt aviśrāntam mahākhagaḥ

original: uḍḍīyānaṃ tad eva syāt tava bandho'bhidhīyate // GorS(2)_77 (=HYP 3.56) //
analyzed: uḍḍīyānam tat eva syāt tava bandhaḥ abhidhīyate

original: udarāt paścime bhāge hy adho nābher nigadyate /
analyzed: udarāt paścime bhāge hi adhas nābheḥ nigadyate

original: uḍḍīyanasya bandho'yaṃ tatra bandho vidhīyate // GorS(2)_78 //
analyzed: uḍḍīyanasya bandhaḥ iyam tatra bandhaḥ vidhīyate

original: badhnāti hi sirājālam adho-gāmi śiro-jalam /
analyzed: badhnāti hi sirā jālam adhogāmi śiraḥ jalam

original: tato jālandharo bandhaḥ kaṇṭha-duḥkhaugha-nāśanaḥ // GorS(2)_79 (=HYP 3.71) //
analyzed: tatas jālandharaḥ bandhaḥ kaṇṭha duḥkha ogha nāśanaḥ

original: jālandhare kṛte bandhe kaṇṭha-saṃkoca-lakṣaṇe /
analyzed: jālandhare kṛte bandhe kaṇṭha saṃkoca lakṣaṇe

original: pīyūṣaṃ na pataty agnau na ca vāyuḥ prakupyati // GorS(2)_80 (=1/36, HYP 3.72) //
analyzed: pīyūṣam na patati agnau na ca vāyuḥ prakupyati

original: pārṣṇi-bhāgena sampīḍya yonim ākuñcayed gudam /
analyzed: pārṣṇi bhāgena sampīḍya yonim ākuñcayet gudam

original: apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūla-bandho'bhidhīyate // GorS(2)_81 (=1/37, HYP 3.61) //
analyzed: apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūlabandhaḥ abhidhīyate

original: apāna-prāṇayor aikyāt kṣayān mūtra-purīṣayoḥ /
analyzed: apāna prāṇayoḥ aikyāt kṣayāt mūtra purīṣayoḥ

original: yuvā bhavati vṛddho'pi satataṃ mūla-bandhanāt // GorS(2)_82 (=1/38, HYP 3.65) //
analyzed: yuvā bhavati vṛddhaḥ api satatam mūlabandhanāt

original: padmāsanaṃ samāruhya sama-kāya-śiro-dharaḥ /
analyzed: padmāsanam samāruhya sama kāya śirodharaḥ

original: nāsāgra-dṛṣṭir ekānte japed oṅkāram avyayam // GorS(2)_83 //
analyzed: nāsā agra dṛṣṭiḥ ekānte japet oṅkāram avyayam

original: bhūr bhuvaḥ svar ime lokāḥ soma-sūryāgni-devatāḥ /
analyzed: bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar ime lokāḥ soma sūrya agni devatāḥ

original: yasyā mātrāsu tiṣṭhanti tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_84 //
analyzed: yasyāḥ mātrāsu tiṣṭhanti tat param jyotiḥ om iti

original: trayaḥ kālās trayo vedās trayo lokās trayaḥ sverāḥ /
analyzed: trayaḥ kālāḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ trayaḥ lokāḥ trayaḥ sverāḥ

original: trayo devāḥ sthitā yatra tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_85 //
analyzed: trayaḥ devāḥ sthitāḥ yatra tat param jyotiḥ om iti

original: kriyā cecchā tathā jñānā brāhmī raudrī ca vaiṣṇavī /
analyzed: kriyā ca icchā tathā jñānā brāhmī raudrī ca vaiṣṇavī

original: tridhā śaktiḥ sthitā yatra tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_86 //
analyzed: tridhā śaktiḥ sthitā yatra tat param jyotiḥ om iti

original: ākārāś ca tatho-kāro ma-kāro bindu-saṃjñakaḥ /
analyzed: ākārāḥ ca tathā ukāraḥ makāraḥ bindu saṃjñakaḥ

original: tisro mātrāḥ sthitā yatra tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_87 //
analyzed: tisraḥ mātrāḥ sthitāḥ yatra tat param jyotiḥ om iti

original: vacasā taj jayed bījaṃ vapuṣā tat samabhyaset /
analyzed: vacasā tat jayet bījam vapuṣā tat samabhyaset

original: manasā tat smaren nityaṃ tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_88 //
analyzed: manasā tat smaret nityam tat param jyotiḥ om iti

original: śucir vāpy aśucir vāpi yo japet praṇavaṃ sadā /
analyzed: śuciḥ vā api aśuciḥ vā api yaḥ japet praṇavam sadā

original: lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā // GorS(2)_89 //
analyzed: lipyate na sa pāpena padma patram iva ambhasā

original: cale vāte calo bindur niścale niścalo bhavet /
analyzed: cale vāte calaḥ binduḥ niścale niścalaḥ bhavet

original: yogī sthāṇutvam āpnoti tato vāyuṃ nirodhayet // GorS(2)_90 (=1/39, HYP 2.2) //
analyzed: yogī sthāṇu tvam āpnoti tatas vāyum nirodhayet

original: yāvad vāyuḥ sthito dehe tāvaj jīvanam ucyate /
analyzed: yāvat vāyuḥ sthitaḥ dehe tāvat jīvanam ucyate

original: maraṇaṃ tasya niṣkrāntis tato vāyuṃ nirodhayet // GorS(2)_91 (=HYP 2.3) //
analyzed: maraṇam tasya niṣkrāntiḥ tatas vāyum nirodhayet

original: yāvad baddho marud dehe yāvac cittaṃ nirākulam /
analyzed: yāvat baddhaḥ marut dehe yāvat cittam nirākulam

original: yāvad dṛṣṭir bhruvor madhye tāvat kāla-bhayaṃ kutaḥ // GorS(2)_92 (=HYP 2.40) //
analyzed: yāvat dṛṣṭiḥ bhruvoḥ madhye tāvat kāla bhayam kutas

original: ataḥ kāla-bhayād brahmā prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: atas kāla bhayāt brahmā prāṇāyāma parāyaṇaḥ

original: yogino munayaś caiva tato vāyuṃ nirodhayet // GorS(2)_93 //
analyzed: yoginaḥ munayaḥ ca eva tatas vāyum nirodhayet

original: ṣaṭ-triṃśad-aṅgulo haṃsaḥ prayāṇaṃ kurute bahiḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat aṅgulaḥ haṃsaḥ prayāṇam kurute bahis

original: vāma-dakṣiṇa-mārgeṇa tataḥ prāṇo'bhidhīyate // GorS(2)_94 (=1/40) //
analyzed: vāma dakṣiṇa mārgeṇa tatas prāṇaḥ abhidhīyate

original: śuddhim eti yadā sarvaṃ nāḍī-cakraṃ malākulam /
analyzed: śuddhim eti yadā sarvam nāḍī cakram mala ākulam

original: tadaiva jāyate yogī prāṇa-saṃgrahaṇe kṣamaḥ // GorS(2)_95 //
analyzed: tadā eva jāyate yogī prāṇa saṃgrahaṇe kṣamaḥ

original: baddha-padmāsano yogī prāṇaṃ candreṇa pūrayet /
analyzed: baddha padmāsanaḥ yogī prāṇam candreṇa pūrayet

original: dhārayitvā yathā-śakti bhūyaḥ sūryeṇa recayet // GorS(2)_96 (=1/43) //
analyzed: dhārayitvā yathāśakti bhūyas sūryeṇa recayet

original: amṛtaṃ dadhi-saṅkāśaṃ go-kṣīra-rajatopamam /
analyzed: amṛtam dadhi saṅkāśam go kṣīra rajata upamam

original: dhyātvā candramaso bimbaṃ prāṇāyāmī sukhī bhavet // GorS(2)_97 (=1/44) //
analyzed: dhyātvā candramasaḥ bimbam prāṇāyāmī sukhī bhavet

original: dakṣiṇo śvāsam ākṛṣya pūrayed udaraṃ śanaiḥ /
analyzed: śvāsam ākṛṣya pūrayet udaram śanais

original: kumbhayitvā vidhānena puraś candreṇa recayet // GorS(2)_98 (=1/45) //
analyzed: kumbhayitvā vidhānena puras candreṇa recayet

original: prajvalaj-jvalana-jvālā- puñjam āditya-maṇḍalam /
analyzed: prajvalat jvalana jvālā puñjam āditya maṇḍalam

original: dhyātvā nābhi-sthitaṃ yogī prāṇāyāme sukhī bhavet // GorS(2)_99 (=1/46) //
analyzed: dhyātvā nābhi sthitam yogī prāṇāyāme sukhī bhavet  /

original: prāṇaṃ codiḍayā piben parimitaṃ bhūyo'nyayā recayet pītvā piṅgalayā samīraṇam atho baddhvā tyajed vāmayā /
analyzed: prāṇam ca udiḍayā pibet parimitam bhūyonyayā recayet pītvā piṅgalayā samīraṇam atho baddhvā tyajet vāmayā

original: sūrya-candramasor anena vidhinā bimba-dvayaṃ dhyāyataḥ śuddhā nāḍi-gaṇā bhavanti yamino māsa-trayād ūrdhvataḥ // GorS(2)_100 (=HYP 2.10) //
analyzed: sūrya candramasoḥ anena vidhinā bimba dvayam dhyāyataḥ śuddhāḥ nāḍi gaṇāḥ bhavanti yaminaḥ māsa trayāt ūrdhvatas

original: yatheṣṭhaṃ dhāraṇaṃ vāyor analasya pradīpanam /
analyzed: yatheṣṭham dhāraṇam vāyoḥ analasya pradīpanam

original: nādābhivyaktir ārogyaṃ jāyate nāḍi-śodhanāt // GorS(2)_101 //
iti gorakṣa-śatakaṃ sampūrṇam
analyzed: iti gorakṣa śatakam sampūrṇam
